newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: SNB still ready to add liquidity - spokesman.
newsitem.headline: SNB still ready to add liquidity - spokesman.

text.p: The Swiss National Bank said it will continue to add liquidity to the money market as needed, an SNB spokesman said.
"We are still being generous, with respect to money markets," said an SNB spokesman in response to an enquiry.

The SNB already said on Thursday that it was adding significant amounts of liquidity to the money market. Its latest actions this week followed news Thursday the Bundesbank cut its repurchase rate, an move which triggered similar cuts by some other European central banks. -- Zurich Editorial, +41 1 631 7340
